message.body: Hi Hunter...we sold all of the babas....so just checking how many more you have...thanks!
Hi again...would you consider a commission of a larger hand cut version of baba? If so....think abt it and give me a size & price..he would like larger t
han edition size and original. Thanks!

I think I only have 2 more of baba laser cuts. I have a different but similar image that I'd like to do a larger dimensioned edition in laser cut but my guy who cut them for me can no longer do it so I have to find a new source for lasercutting
R they in wood frames or white?
What is your booth # at scope?
